titleInfo.title: Point of Reference. Trust and the Function of Written Agreements in a Late-Medieval Town
Strategies of Writing. Studies on Text and Trust in the Middle Ages (Papers from “Trust in Writing in the Middle Ages”)

bibliographicCitation.mla: Arlinghaus, Franz-Josef. “Point of Reference. Trust and the Function of Written Agreements in a Late-Medieval Town”. Strategies of Writing.
